title.rendered: The Manifest Names Intellectsoft as Ukraine’s Top Recommended Staff Augmentation Company for 2021

content.rendered:
Last year was a rollercoaster ride for every one of us, that’s why it means a lot to be celebrating this massive milestone with all of you. Just recently, we’ve been made aware that our company was recognized as one of the most recommended companies for 2021.

Looking back at our journey, we couldn’t be more proud of the achievements that we’ve unlocked with our clients. Time continues to pass quickly but we never forget to be grateful for every moment with everyone who supports us.

Founded in 2007, our company is a digital transformation consultancy that is widely renowned for its unparalleled solutions and services. Our extensive portfolio of services and case studies have earned us accolades and praise from various industry professionals. What puts the cherry on top for us is the overwhelming support of our clients in spite of challenges and hurdles. Because of their feedback, we were recognized by The Manifest.

The Manifest is a B2B guide that analyzes hard data, publishes industry surveys, and provides industry wisdom. Browsers can scroll through their directories and learn more about the different service providers from all over the world.

According to their findings, Intellectsoft is Ukraine’s most recommended and reviewed staff augmentation company for 2021! Our company ranks among the top 15 service providers in the regions thanks to our pricing, project management, quality, and overall client relationships. To qualify for this award, companies must showcase unparalleled success and growth along with their clients.

“It’s a huge honor for Intellectsoft to hit this prestigious The Manifest award and be recognized by such an authoritative platform. Our team has already received multiple awards over the years, and this one gives us even more motivation to work harder and attain better results. 

We will set more ambitious goals in the future and will channel all our efforts into exceeding our accomplishments. Being named as one of the top firms spurs us to grow exponentially as the leading software development company.” — Chief Executive Officer of Intellectsoft

High regards such as this recognition mean a lot to us. Thank you to everyone who helped bring this to reality! Cheers!

Grow your business with our expertise! Get in touch with us, tell us more about your project, and receive a free quote from our team.
